title: The Epstein case: Thirty years of judicial negligence, at the expense of victims
subhed: The first complaints against the millionaire date back to 1996. Yet between his initial conviction in 2008 and his arrest in the summer of 2019, he was never troubled by the justice system.

title: Gazans who fled the enclave face traumatic return
In substance, Rubio's message in Munich was the same as Vance's
Baby treated in utero for rare vascular tumor, a medical first
subhed: Issa, a baby diagnosed with the rare Kasabach-Merritt syndrome, received treatment before birth through medication administered to his mother. This marks a medical first for this condition.

title: Robert Duvall, actor known for 'The Godfather' and 'Apocalypse Now,' dies at 95
subhed: Robert Duvall was known for playing William Kilgore, the US army officer who loved 'the smell of napalm in the morning,' in Francis Ford Coppola's 'Apocalypse Now,' and smooth mafia consigliere Tom Hagen in 'The Godfather.'

title: Gabriella Karefa-Johnson, a New York fashion provocateur styling Serena Williams and NYC's first lady Rama Duwaji
subhed: The stylist turned heads at the Diotima show during New York Fashion Week alongside Rama Duwaji, New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani's wife, whom she had dressed in January for his inauguration. Since resigning from Vogue in 2023, Karefa-Johnson has consistently cultivated her independent voice and critical take on the fashion world.

title: Agnès Delahaye, historian: 'The Minneapolis protests are part of the major historical social struggles in the US'
subhed: In an interview with Le Monde, the historian said that Donald Trump's narrative of a white America radiating power is intended to erase the complexity of a multicultural past shaped by violence and struggles for emancipation.

title: France ready to offer major concessions to sell Rafale jets to India
byline: By Chloé Hoorman and Elise Vincent

How Jeffrey Epstein built the global network that protected him
subhed: The sexual predator, who came from a modest background, used his scheming and manipulation to open the doors to the global elite. His influence was such that many powerful figures continued to associate with him, even after his first conviction in 2008.

title: 'A drunk woman is shameful': Why women face greater risks but receive less support for alcohol addiction
subhed: Although women as a whole drink less alcohol than men, they are physiologically more vulnerable to its toxicity. Yet these increased health risks are often met with silence, violence and delays in accessing care.

title: 'Cancer is a political issue because public authorities have the power to prevent it, yet fail to do so'
subhed: Fleur Breteau, the founder of the Cancer Colère advocacy group, discusses the connection between public health and the agricultural model and France's lag in this area.

title: After Munich Security Conference, Europeans have a duty to unite
